js.angular_preventdefault
*************************

Introduction
============

This library packages `angular-prevent-default`_ for `fanstatic`_.

.. _`fanstatic`: http://fanstatic.org
.. _`angular-prevent-default`: http://qloo.github.io/angular-prevent-default/index.html

This requires integration between your web framework and ``fanstatic``,
and making sure that the original resources (shipped in the ``resources``
directory in ``js.angular_preventdefault``) are published to some URL.
